channel.title: Comments on: Find Out What Percent Of The Log Is Being Used For Each Database In SQL Server 2005 and 2008
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Thanks

Yes Microsoft has made it soooooooo much easier to get all this information now. The dynamic management views are really helpful for a variety of things. Without these dynamic management views finding out what indexes are used or not used was a big pain in the neck

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
For instances I don’t have licensing for my monitoring software I use a query very much like yours and it works great.

Nice write up Denis!
